member.summary: Gets or sets whether the enhanced interval management should prefer to show all the labels if possible without collisions for supported types of category axes. This is for use with EnhancedIntervalMinimumCharacters = -1 and axes that have an integral interval.

member.summary: Gets the current actual full count of the items in the data source.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbBaseDataSource.FirstVisibleIndexRequested
member.summary: Gets or sets which index consumers of the data source desire to be the current first visible index. A grid, for example, would indicate the current visible top row, and update this as that changes.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbBaseDataSource.LastVisibleIndexRequested
member.summary: Gets or sets which index consumers of the data source desire to be the current last visible index. A grid, for example, would indicate the current visible top row, and update this as that changes.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbBaseDataSource.DeferAutoRefresh
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the auto refresh mechanism of the data source is currently defered. The data source will not react to most setting changes while this is set to true an will instead defer processing. Setting this value to false will queue a new refresh.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbBaseDataSource.PrimaryKey
member.summary: Gets or sets a list of property references that indicate the user provided primary key of the items in the data source. Consumers of the data source will often need to uniquely identify items in the data source. For this purpose a primary key should be specified.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbBaseDataSource.PropertiesRequested
member.summary: Gets or sets a list of property references for the properties desired by the consumer of the data source. If known, the data source may take steps to request only those properties, or to ensure that those properties are included, rather than the default behavior for this type of data source.

member.summary: Gets or sets what properties should be included when resolving the datasource schema. If null, all properties are included.

member.summary: Gets or sets how section headers are displayed.

member.summary: Gets or sets if sections are collapsable.

member.summary: Gets or sets whether the data source should include summary rows inside the group when summaries are present.

member.summary: Gets or sets whether the summary rows within a section are placed at the bottom of the section, otherwise they will be placed at the top.

member.name: M:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbBaseDataSource.NotifyClearItemsAsync
member.summary: Manually notifies the data source that the data it has bound to has been cleared and needs to be re-examined. This should not be necessary to call if the data that the data source is bound to is already observable.

member.name: M:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbBaseDataSource.QueueAutoRefreshAsync
member.summary: Called to manually queue a refresh of the data source.

member.name: M:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbBaseDataSource.FlushAutoRefreshAsync
member.summary: Called to make sure a queued refresh of the data source has been applied before continuing. Should only be needed if you are trying to synchronously examine the results of changing settings on the data source. Note, for a virtual data source, the data source itself may be waiting for other synchronous requests to actualize data. This call will not wait for those, but will only make sure the appropriate requests are in flight from the settings changes

member.name: M:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbBaseDataSource.RefreshAsync
member.summary: Called to synchronously refresh the data source.

member.param: The item for which to find the index.

member.summary: Gets or sets the position at which to start rendering the ranges, measured from the front/bottom of the control as a value from 0 to 1. Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal size of the bullet graph.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbBulletGraph.RangeOuterExtent
member.summary: Gets or sets the position at which to stop rendering the range as a value from 0 to 1 measured from the front/bottom of the bullet graph. Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal size of the bullet graph.

member.summary: Gets or sets the position at which to start rendering the actual value geometries, measured from the front/bottom of the bullet graph as a value from 0 to 1. Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal size of the bullet graph.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbBulletGraph.ValueOuterExtent
member.summary: Gets or sets the position at which to stop rendering the actual value geometries as a value from 0 to 1 measured from the front/bottom of the bullet graph. Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal size of the bullet graph.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbBulletGraph.LabelsPreTerminal

member.summary: Provides a means of setting TransitionOutEasingFunction in the JavaScript environment.

member.summary: Gets or sets the type of chart series to generate from the data.

member.summary: Gets or sets whether the x axis enhanced interval management should prefer to show all the labels if possible without collisions for supported types of category axes. This is for use with EnhancedIntervalMinimumCharacters = -1 and axes that have an integral interval.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbCategoryChart.YAxisEnhancedIntervalPreferMoreCategoryLabels
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the y axis enhanced interval management should prefer to show all the labels if possible without collisions for supported types of category axes. This is for use with EnhancedIntervalMinimumCharacters = -1 and axes that have an integral interval.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbCategoryChart.YAxisAutoRangeBufferMode
member.summary: Gets or sets how the numeric axis will adjust its range buffer to less closely fix the data from the series.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbCategoryChart.YAxisIsLogarithmic
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the Y-axis should use a logarithmic scale instead of a linear one.
member.remarks: Since log(-1) is imaginary and log(0) is undefined, it is recommended to enable this property only when the Y-axis minimum is greater than zero.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbCategoryChart.YAxisLogarithmBase
member.summary: Gets or sets the base value to use in the log function when mapping the position of data items along the Y-axis.
member.remarks: This property is effective only when YAxisIsLogarithmic is true.

member.summary: Gets or sets the data value corresponding to the maximum value of the Y-axis.

member.summary: Gets or sets the frequency of displayed minor lines along the Y-axis.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbDataChart.ActualWindowScaleVertical
member.summary: A number between 0 and 1 determining the scale of the vertical zoom.

member.summary: Gets or sets whether groups are expanded or collapsed by default.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbDataGrid.GroupSummaryDisplayMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the display mode summaries will use inside groups.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbDataGrid.AutoAcceptEdits
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to automatically accept edits or require explicit acceptance or rejections of edits when handling the CellValueChanging or DataCommitting events. When True, nothing is required on the part of the developer in order for edits to be accepted. In order to validate and reject a user cell edit you must explicitly handle the CellValueChanging event and call the RejectEdit method using the edit ID provided by the event. In order to reject a whole commit you need to handle the DataComitting event and explicitly call the RejectCommit method using the commit ID provided by the event. When False, cell edits are not immediately accepted until you explicitly call the AcceptEdit method using the edit ID provided by the CellValueChanging event. If you do not handle this event then edits will be auto accepted.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbDataGrid.PrimaryKey
member.summary: Sets or gets the user provided primary key to assume for the data. Certain functionality of the grid requires a way to uniquely identify items in order to work correctly. If a primary key cannot be inferred from the data source, you may need to provide one here.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbDataGrid.ActualPrimaryKey
member.summary: Gets either the inferred primary key from the data source, or the user provided primary key, if present. Represents the actual primary key that the grid will use in operations that require it.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbDomainChart.DataSource
member.summary: Gets or sets a collection of data items used to generate the chart.
member.remarks: The ItemsSource of this chart can be a list of objects containing one or more numeric properties. Additionally, if the objects in the list implement the IEnumerable interface, the Chart will attempt to delve into the sub-collections when reading through the data source. Data binding can be further configured by attributing the data item classes with the DataSeriesMemberIntentAttribute.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbDomainChart.DataSourceScript
member.summary: Provides a means of setting DataSource in the JavaScript environment.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbDomainChart.HighlightedDataSource
member.summary: Gets or sets a collection of data items used to generate the chart.
member.remarks: The HighlightedItemsSource of this chart can be a list of objects containing one or more numeric properties. Additionally, if the objects in the list implement the IEnumerable interface, the Chart will attempt to delve into the sub-collections when reading through the data source. Data binding can be further configured by attributing the data item classes with the DataSeriesMemberIntentAttribute.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbDomainChart.HighlightedDataSourceScript
member.summary: Provides a means of setting HighlightedDataSource in the JavaScript environment.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbDomainChart.IncludedProperties
member.summary: Gets or sets a set of property paths that should be included for consideration by the category chart, leaving the remainder excluded. If null, all properties will be considered.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbDomainChart.ExcludedProperties
member.summary: Gets or sets a set of property paths that should be excluded from consideration by the category chart.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbDomainChart.Brushes
member.summary: Gets or sets the palette of brushes to use for coloring the chart series.
member.remarks: The value provided should be an array of CSS color strings or JavaScript objects defining gradients. Optionally the first element can be a string reading "RGB" or "HSV" to specify the interpolation mode of the collection

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbDomainChart.Outlines
member.summary: Gets or sets the palette of brushes to use for outlines on the chart series.
member.remarks: The value provided should be an array of CSS color strings or JavaScript objects defining gradients. Optionally the first element can be a string reading "RGB" or "HSV" to specify the interpolation mode of the collection

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbDomainChart.ActualBrushes
member.summary: Gets the actual palette of brushes to use for coloring the chart series.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbDomainChart.ActualOutlines
member.summary: Gets the actual palette of brushes to use for outlines on the chart series.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbDomainChart.Legend
member.summary: Gets or sets the legend to connect this chart to.
member.remarks: When the legend property is set, the chart will use it to display information about its series. Legends can be shared by multiple chart controls.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbDomainChart.LegendScript
member.summary: Provides a means of setting Legend in the JavaScript environment.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbDomainChart.IsHorizontalZoomEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the chart can be horizontally zoomed through user interactions.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbDomainChart.IsVerticalZoomEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the chart can be vertically zoomed through user interactions.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbDomainChart.ShouldDisplayMockData
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the chart should display mock data when the data source has not been provided, if supported for this type of chart.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbDomainChart.ShouldUseSkeletonStyleForMockData
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the chart should use a faded skeleton style for mock data.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbDomainChart.HighlightedValuesDisplayMode
member.summary: Gets or sets whether and how to display highlighted values for the series. Note, this is distinct from the highlighting feature that indicates what is closest or under the mouse. This property applies to Category Chart and Financial Chart controls.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbDomainChart.IsSeriesHighlightingEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the chart can highlight series through user interactions. This property applies to Category Chart and Financial Chart controls.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbDomainChart.HighlightedLegendItemVisibility
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the chart can highlight series through user interactions. This property applies to Category Chart and Financial Chart controls.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbDomainChart.WindowRect
member.summary: Gets or sets the rectangle representing the current scroll and zoom state of the chart.
member.remarks: WindowRect is expressed as a Rectangle with coordinates and sizes between 0 and 1.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbDomainChart.ChartTitle
member.summary: Gets or sets text to display above the plot area.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbDomainChart.Subtitle
member.summary: Gets or sets text to display below the Title, above the plot area.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbDomainChart.TitleAlignment
member.summary: Gets or sets horizontal alignment which determines the title position, relative to the left and right edges of the control.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbDomainChart.SubtitleAlignment
member.summary: Gets or sets horizontal alignment which determines the subtitle position, relative to the left and right edges of the control.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbDomainChart.UnknownValuePlotting
member.summary: Gets or sets the behavior that determines how unknown values will be plotted on the chart.
member.remarks: Null and Double.NaN are two examples of unknown values.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbDomainChart.Resolution
member.summary: Gets or sets the rendering resolution for all series in this chart.
member.remarks: Where n = Resolution, for every n horizontal pixels, combine all items into a single data point. When Resolution = 0, all data points will be rendered as graphical objects. Charts with a higher resolution will have faster performance.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbDomainChart.Thickness
member.summary: Gets or sets the thickness for all series in this chart. Depending on the ChartType, this can be the main brush used, or just the outline.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbDomainChart.OutlineMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the OutlineMode for all series in this chart.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbDomainChart.MarkerOutlineMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the MarkerOutlineMode for all series that support markers in this chart.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbDomainChart.MarkerFillMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the MarkerFillMode for all series that support markers in this chart.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbDomainChart.MarkerFillOpacity
member.summary: Gets or sets the Marker Fill Opacity for all series that support markers in this chart.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbDomainChart.MarkerThickness
member.summary: Gets or sets the Marker Thickness for all series that support markers in this chart.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbDomainChart.MarkerTypes
member.summary: Gets or sets the marker shapes used for indicating location of data points in this chart.
member.remarks: This property applies only to these chart types: point, line, spline, bubble, and polygon

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbDomainChart.MarkerAutomaticBehavior
member.summary: Gets or sets the default marker type for all series plotted in this chart.
member.remarks: This property is ignored when the MarkerTypes property is set

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbDomainChart.MarkerBrushes
member.summary: Gets or sets the palette of brushes used for rendering fill area of data point markers.
member.remarks: This property applies only to these chart types: point, line, spline, bubble, and polygon

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbDomainChart.WindowRectMinWidth
member.summary: Sets or gets the minimum width that the window rect is allowed to reach before being clamped. Decrease this value if you want to allow for further zooming into the viewer. If this value is lowered too much it can cause graphical corruption due to floating point arithmetic inaccuracy.
member.remarks: This property accepts values between 0.0 (max zooming) and 1.0 (no zooming)

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbDomainChart.WindowRectMinHeight
member.summary: Sets or gets the minimum height that the window rect is allowed to reach before being clamped. Decrease this value if you want to allow for further zooming into the viewer. If this value is lowered too much it can cause graphical corruption due to floating point arithmetic inaccuracy.
member.remarks: This property accepts values between 0.0 (max zooming) and 1.0 (no zooming)

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbDomainChart.WindowSizeMinWidth
member.summary: Sets or gets minimum pixel width that the window is allowed to reach before being clamped. Decrease this value if you want to allow for further zooming into the viewer. If this value is lowered too much it can cause graphical corruption due to floating point arithmetic inaccuracy.
member.remarks: This property is overridden by the WindowRectMinWidth property

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbDomainChart.WindowSizeMinHeight
member.summary: Sets or gets minimum pixel height that the window is allowed to reach before being clamped. Decrease this value if you want to allow for further zooming into the viewer. If this value is lowered too much it can cause graphical corruption due to floating point arithmetic inaccuracy.
member.remarks: This property is overridden by the WindowRectMinHeight property

member.summary: Gets or sets whether the Y-axis should use a logarithmic scale instead of a linear one.
member.remarks: Since log(-1) is imaginary and log(0) is undefined, it is recommended to enable this property only when the Y-axis minimum is greater than zero.

member.summary: Gets or sets starting category that chart will move its zoom window. Acceptable value is between 0 and number of data items
member.remarks: This property works only with ordinal XAxisMode and it is overridden by chart's WindowRect or WindowScaleHorizontal properties

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbFinancialChart.XAxisZoomMaximumItemSpan
member.summary: Gets or sets maximum pixel span of series item that will be visible at maximum zooming level This property ensures that series item does not get stretch above specified value.
member.remarks: This property works only with ordinal XAxisMode and it is overridden by chart's WindowRectMinWidth property

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbFinancialChart.XAxisZoomToCategoryRange
member.summary: Gets or sets number of categories that the chart will zoom in and fill plot area
member.remarks: This property is overridden by chart's WindowRect or WindowScaleHorizontal properties

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbFinancialChart.XAxisZoomToItemSpan
member.summary: Gets or sets pixel span of series item that will be used to zoom chart such that the item has desired span Chart will automatically zoom in until series item has specified pixel span.
member.remarks: This property works only with ordinal XAxisMode and it is overridden by chart's WindowRect or WindowScaleHorizontal properties

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbFinancialChart.YAxisMode
member.summary: The scaling mode of the Y-axis.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbFinancialChart.IsToolbarVisible
member.summary: A boolean property controlling the visibility of the toolbar.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbFinancialChart.ChartType
member.summary: The type of price series to display in the main chart.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbFinancialChart.YAxisLabelHorizontalAlignment
member.summary: Gets or sets Horizontal alignment of Y-axis labels.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbFinancialChart.IsWindowSyncedToVisibleRange
member.summary: A boolean indicating whether the chart should automatically zoom in vertically on the currently visible range of data.
member.remarks: When this property is set to true, panning and zooming along the X-axis will result in a corresponding zoom on the Y-axis, so that the visible range of data fills the zoom window as fully as possible.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbFinancialChart.IndicatorTypes
member.summary: A collection indicating what financial indicator types to display on the Financial Chart.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbFinancialChart.OverlayTypes
member.summary: A collection indicating what financial overlay types to display on the Financial Chart.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbFinancialChart.YAxisAbbreviateLargeNumbers
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the large numbers on the Y-axis labels are abbreviated.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbFinancialChart.Resolution
member.summary: Gets or sets the rendering resolution for all series in this chart.
member.remarks: Where n = Resolution, for every n horizontal pixels, combine all items into a single datapoint. When Resolution = 0, all datapoints will be rendered as graphical objects. Charts with a higher resolution will have faster performance.

member.name: M:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbGrid.ClearGroupingAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Clears grouping for particular column, array of columns or all columns. @remarks Clears all grouping in the grid, if no parameter is passed. If a parameter is provided, clears grouping for a particular column or an array of columns. @example ```typescript this.grid.clearGrouping(); //clears all grouping this.grid.clearGrouping("ID"); //ungroups a single column this.grid.clearGrouping(["ID", "Column1", "Column2"]); //ungroups multiple columns ``` name Name of column or array of column names to be ungrouped.
member.param: Name of column or array of column names to be ungrouped.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbColumn.ParentColumn
M:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbColumn.PinAsync(System.Double)
member.summary: Pins the column at the provided index in the pinned area. Defaults to index `0` if not provided, or to the initial index in the pinned area. Returns `true` if the column is successfully pinned. Returns `false` if the column cannot be pinned. Column cannot be pinned if: - Is already pinned - index argument is out of range - The pinned area exceeds 80% of the grid width ```typescript let success = this.column.pin(); ``` @memberof IgxColumnComponent

member.name: M:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbColumn.UnpinAsync(System.Double)
member.summary: Unpins the column and place it at the provided index in the unpinned area. Defaults to index `0` if not provided, or to the initial index in the unpinned area. Returns `true` if the column is successfully unpinned. Returns `false` if the column cannot be unpinned. Column cannot be unpinned if: - Is already unpinned - index argument is out of range ```typescript let success = this.column.unpin(); ``` @memberof IgxColumnComponent

member.summary: Gets or sets the position at which to start rendering the ranges, measured from the front/bottom of the control as a value from 0 to 1. Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal size of the linear gauge.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbLinearGauge.ScaleInnerExtent
member.summary: Gets or sets the position at which to start rendering the scale, measured from the bottom/front (when orientation is horizontal/vertical) of the control as a value from 0 to 1. Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal size of the linear gauge.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbLinearGauge.RangeOuterExtent
member.summary: Gets or sets the position at which to stop rendering the range as a value from 0 to 1 measured from the front/bottom of the linear gauge. Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal size of the linear gauge.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbLinearGauge.ScaleOuterExtent
member.summary: Gets or sets the position at which to stop rendering the scale as a value from 0 to 1 measured from the bottom/front (when orientation is horizontal/vertical) of the linear gauge. Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal size of the linear gauge.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbLinearGauge.NeedleInnerExtent
member.summary: Gets or sets the position at which to start rendering the needle geometry, measured from the front/bottom of the linear gauge as a value from 0 to 1. Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal size of the linear gauge.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbLinearGauge.NeedleOuterExtent
member.summary: Gets or sets the position at which to stop rendering the needle geometry as a value from 0 to 1 measured from the front/bottom of the linear gauge. Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal size of the linear gauge.

member.summary: A value to start adding tickmarks, added to the scale's MinimumValue.

member.summary: A value to stop adding tickmarks, subtracted from the scale's MaximumValue.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbLinearGauge.LabelInterval
member.summary: Gets or sets the interval to use for rendering labels. This defaults to be the same interval as the tickmarks on the scale.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbLinearGauge.LabelExtent
member.summary: Gets or sets the position at which to put the labels as a value from 0 to 1, measured from the bottom of the scale. Values further from zero than 1 can be used to hide the labels of the linear gauge.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbLinearGauge.LabelsPostInitial
member.summary: A value to start adding labels, added to the scale's MinimumValue.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbLinearGauge.LabelsPreTerminal
member.summary: A value to stop adding labels, subtracted from the scale's MaximumValue.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbLinearGauge.MinorTickCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of minor tickmarks to place between major tickmarks.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbLinearGauge.TickStartExtent
member.summary: Gets or sets the position at which to start rendering the major tickmarks as a value from 0 to 1, measured from the front/bottom of the linear gauge. Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal size of the linear gauge.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbLinearGauge.TickEndExtent
member.summary: Gets or sets the position at which to stop rendering the major tickmarks as a value from 0 to 1, measured from the front/bottom of the linear gauge. Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal size of the linear gauge.

member.summary: Gets or sets the stroke thickness to use when rendering ticks.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbLinearGauge.TickBrush

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbMultiColumnComboBox.ValueField
member.summary: Sets or gets the user provided primary key to assume for the data. Certain functionality of the combo (such as the the current Value) requires a way to uniquely identify items in order to work correctly. If a primary key cannot be inferred from the data source, you may need to provide one here.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbMultiColumnComboBox.ActualValueField
member.summary: Gets the actual name of the field in the data source will be used as the Value of the MultiColumnComboBox.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbMultiColumnComboBox.Value
member.summary: Gets or sets the Value of the combo.
member.remarks: When the user selects an item from, the value is set based on the specified ValueField field. If not ValueField is specified, then the first field in the data source is used. When the user enters text into the combo, the list is searched based on the TextField field. If a matching string is found, the Value of the combo is the value of the ValueField field in the same row. If the text entered in the combo does not match any item on the list, then the value will return null.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbMultiColumnComboBox.IsFixed
member.summary: Indicates that the dropdown will position itself relative to the window instead of the document.

member.summary: Indicates that the dropdown should open as a child of the combobox.

member.summary: Gets or sets the scaling value used to affect the pixel density of the control.
member.remarks: A higher scaling ratio will produce crisper visuals at the expense of memory. Lower values will cause the control to appear blurry.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbPieChartBase.ActualPixelScalingRatio
member.summary: Resolved pixel scaling ratio. Unless explicitly overridden by the PieChartBase.PixelScalingRatio property, this one returns the default ratio enforced by device. High resolution devices will initialize this property to a higher value.

member.summary: Manually overrides the style to use for the labels.

member.name: M:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbPieChartBase.FlushAsync
member.summary: Use to force the pie chart to finish any deferred work before printing or evaluating its visual.
member.remarks: This should only be called if the visual of the pie chart needs to be synchronously saved or evaluated. Calling this method too often will hinder the performance of the pie chart.

member.summary: Gets or sets the brush to use when rendering the outline of the needle.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbRadialGauge.NeedleStartExtent
member.summary: Gets or sets the extent (from -1 to 1) at which to start rendering the needle, measured from the center of the gauge. Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal radius of the gauge.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbRadialGauge.NeedleEndExtent
member.summary: Gets or sets the extent (from -1 to 1) at which to end rendering the needle, measured from the center of the gauge. Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal radius of the gauge.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbRadialGauge.NeedleShape
member.summary: Gets or sets the shape to use when rendering the needle from a number of options.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbRadialGauge.NeedleStartWidthRatio
member.summary: Gets or sets the width of the needle at its point using a value from (0 to 1). Note: Only some needle shapes respect this property. Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal radius of the gauge.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbRadialGauge.NeedleEndWidthRatio
member.summary: Gets or sets the width of the needle at its point using a value from (0 to 1). Note: Only some needle shapes respect this property. Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal radius of the gauge.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbRadialGauge.NeedleBaseFeatureWidthRatio
member.summary: Gets or sets the width of the needle at its feature which is closest to the base (e.g. a bulb) with a value from 0 to 1. Note: Only some needle shapes respect this property, namely: NeedleWithBulb, RectangleWithBulb, TrapezoidWithBulb, and TriangleWithBulb. Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal radius of the gauge.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbRadialGauge.NeedleBaseFeatureExtent
member.summary: Gets or sets the extent of the feature which is closest to the base (e.g. a bulb) with a value from -1 to 1. Note: Only some needle shapes respect this property, namely: NeedleWithBulb, RectangleWithBulb, TrapezoidWithBulb, and TriangleWithBulb. Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal radius of the gauge.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbRadialGauge.NeedlePointFeatureWidthRatio
member.summary: Gets or sets the width of the needle at its feature which is closest to the point (e.g. the tapering point of a needle) with a value from 0 to 1. Note: Only some needle shapes respect this property. Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal radius of the gauge.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbRadialGauge.NeedlePointFeatureExtent
member.summary: Gets or sets the extent of the feature which is closest to the point (e.g. the tapering point of a needle) with a value from -1 to 1. Note: Only some needle shapes respect this property. Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal radius of the gauge.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbRadialGauge.NeedlePivotWidthRatio
member.summary: Gets or sets the width of the cap of the needle with a value from 0 to 1. Note: Will only take effect if you have a cap set on the needle. Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal radius of the gauge.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbRadialGauge.NeedlePivotInnerWidthRatio
member.summary: Gets or sets the width of the inner cutout section of the needle cap with a value from 0 to 1. Note: Will only take effect if you have a cap set on the needle that has a cutout section.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbRadialGauge.NeedlePivotShape
member.summary: Gets or sets the shape to use for the needle cap.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbRadialGauge.ScaleStartExtent
member.summary: Gets or sets the position at which to start rendering the scale, measured from the center of the gauge as a value from 0 to 1. Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal radius of the gauge.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbRadialGauge.NeedlePivotBrush
member.summary: Gets or sets the brush to use for filling the needle cap. Note: this only applies to certain cap shapes.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbRadialGauge.NeedlePivotOutline
member.summary: Gets or sets the brush to use for the outlines of the needle cap.

member.summary: Gets or sets the stroke thickness of the needle outline.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbRadialGauge.NeedlePivotStrokeThickness
member.summary: Gets or sets the stroke thickness to use for the outline of the needle cap.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbRadialGauge.ScaleEndExtent
member.summary: Gets or sets the position at which to stop rendering the scale as a value from 0 to 1 measured from the center of the gauge. Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal radius of the gauge.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbRadialGauge.LabelExtent
member.summary: Gets or sets the position at which to put the labels as a value from 0 to 1, measured form the center of the gauge. Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal radius of the gauge.

member.summary: Gets or sets the multiplying factor to apply to the normal radius of the gauge. The radius of the gauge is defined by the minimum of the width and height of the control divided by 2.0. This introduces a multiplicative factor to that value.

member.summary: Gets or sets a legend for the current series object.
member.remarks: If the Legend property is not set, the series will use the setting according to the parent IgbDataChart's Legend property. This is generally expressed as an element name binding, as the Legend must exist at some other position in the layout. This property only indicates which Legend to use and will not alone cause the legend to be visible.

member.summary: Gets or sets the palette of brushes used for outlines of plotted series.

member.summary: Gets or sets the cross hair point (in world coordinates)

member.summary: Gets or sets which legend to use for all series in this SeriesViewer, unless otherwise specified by the Series.Legend property.
member.remarks: This is generally expressed as an element name binding, as the Legend must exist at some other position in the layout. This property only indicates which Legend to use and will not alone cause the legend to be visible.

member.summary: Gets or sets the highlighting mode to use for the legend linked to the component, when supported.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbSeriesViewer.LegendItemBadgeShape
member.summary: Gets or sets type of legend badges representing all series displayed in a legend linked to this component
member.remarks: This property will be ignored when the LegendItemTemplate or LegendItemBadgeTemplate property is set on a series

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbSeriesViewer.LegendItemBadgeMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the mode of legend badges representing all series in this chart.
member.remarks: This property will be ignored when the LegendItemTemplate or LegendItemBadgeTemplate property is set on a series

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbSeriesViewer.ViewportRect
member.summary: Gets the viewport rectangle associated with the SeriesViewer, the physical dimensions of the plot area.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbSeriesViewer.EffectiveViewport
member.summary: Gets the EffectiveViewport rectangle, representing the effective viewport area after margins have been subtracted.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbSeriesViewer.WindowRect
member.summary: A rectangle representing the portion of the SeriesViewer currently in view.
member.remarks: A rectangle at X=0, Y=0 with a Height and Width of 1 implies the entire plotting area is in view. A Height and Width of .5 would imply that the view is halfway zoomed in.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbSeriesViewer.UseTiledZooming
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the series viewer should use cached tiles during zooms rather than the default live content.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbSeriesViewer.PreferHigherResolutionTiles
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the series viewer should prefer selecting higher resolution tiles over lower resolution tiles when performing tile zooming. Setting this to true will lower performance but increase quality.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbSeriesViewer.ZoomTileCacheSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of zoom tiles that the series viewer should cache while in tiled zooming mode.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbSeriesViewer.HighlightingTransitionDuration
member.summary: Gets or sets the duration the highlighting/de-highlighting effects.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbSeriesViewer.SelectionTransitionDuration
member.summary: Gets or sets the duration the selection/de-Selection effects.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbSeriesViewer.FocusTransitionDuration
member.summary: Gets or sets the duration the Focus/de-Focus effects.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbSeriesViewer.ScrollbarsAnimationDuration
member.summary: Gets or sets the duration of the scrollbar effects.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbSeriesViewer.IsPagePanningAllowed
member.summary: Gets or sets the whether the series viewer can allow the page to pan if a control pan is not possible in the requested direction.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbSeriesViewer.ContentHitTestMode
member.summary: Determines the method of hit testing used when mousing over elements in the chart.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbSeriesViewer.ActualContentHitTestMode
member.summary: Resolved method of hit testing used when the pointer is over elements in the chart.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbSeriesViewer.IsSurfaceInteractionDisabled
member.summary: Gets or sets whether all surface interactions with the plot area should be disabled.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbSeriesViewer.WindowResponse
member.summary: The response to user panning and zooming: whether to update the view immediately while the user action is happening, or to defer the update to after the user action is complete. The user action will be an action such as a mouse drag which causes panning and/or zooming to occur.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbSeriesViewer.WindowRectMinWidth
member.summary: Sets or gets the minimum width that the window rect is allowed to reach before being clamped. Decrease this value if you want to allow for further zooming into the viewer. If this value is lowered too much it can cause graphical corruption due to floating point arithmetic inaccuracy.
member.remarks: This property accepts values between 0.0 (max zooming) and 1.0 (no zooming)

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbSeriesViewer.WindowRectMinHeight
member.summary: Sets or gets the minimum height that the window rect is allowed to reach before being clamped. Decrease this value if you want to allow for further zooming into the viewer. If this value is lowered too much it can cause graphical corruption due to floating point arithmetic inaccuracy.
member.remarks: This property accepts values between 0.0 (max zooming) and 1.0 (no zooming)

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbSeriesViewer.ActualWindowRectMinWidth
member.summary: Gets the actual minimum width that the window rect is allowed to reach before being clamped.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbSeriesViewer.ActualWindowRectMinHeight
member.summary: Gets the actual minimum height that the window rect is allowed to reach before being clamped.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbSeriesViewer.WindowSizeMinWidth
member.summary: Sets or gets minimum pixel width that the window is allowed to reach before being clamped. Decrease this value if you want to allow for further zooming into the viewer. If this value is lowered too much it can cause graphical corruption due to floating point arithmetic inaccuracy.
member.remarks: This property is overridden by the WindowRectMinWidth property

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbSeriesViewer.WindowSizeMinHeight
member.summary: Sets or gets minimum pixel height that the window is allowed to reach before being clamped. Decrease this value if you want to allow for further zooming into the viewer. If this value is lowered too much it can cause graphical corruption due to floating point arithmetic inaccuracy.
member.remarks: This property is overridden by the WindowRectMinHeight property

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbSeriesViewer.SyncChannel
member.summary: Sets or gets the Synchronization channel to use for the SeriesViewer.

member.summary: Gets or sets the current SeriesViewer's crosshair visibility override.

member.summary: Gets or sets the current SeriesViewer's crosshair horizontal brush override.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbSeriesViewer.VerticalCrosshairBrush
member.summary: Gets or sets the current SeriesViewer's crosshair vertical brush override.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbSeriesViewer.ZoomCoercionMode
member.summary: Gets or sets zoom is constrained to within the axes. Setting this to false is a preview feature at the present time.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbSeriesViewer.PlotAreaBackground
member.summary: Gets or sets the brush used as the background for the current SeriesViewer object's plot area.

member.remarks: The default interaction state defines the SeriesViewer's response to right button mouse events.

member.summary: Gets or sets the current SeriesViewer's PanModifier property.

member.summary: Gets or sets the preview rectangle.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbSeriesViewer.HighlightedValuesDisplayMode
member.summary: Gets or sets whether and how to display highlighted values for the series by default. Note, this is distinct from the highlighting feature that indicates what is closest or under the mouse.

member.summary: Gets the currently selected data items. Adding or removing data items from this collection will select or deselect the visuals associated with those items.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbSeriesViewer.FocusedSeriesItems
member.summary: Gets the currently focused data items. Adding or removing data items from this collection will focus or blur the visuals associated with those items.

member.summary: A number between 0 and 1 determining the position of the horizontal scroll.
member.remarks: This property is effectively a shortcut to the X position of the WindowRect property.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbSeriesViewer.WindowPositionVertical
member.summary: A number between 0 and 1 determining the position of the vertical scroll.
member.remarks: This property is effectively a shortcut to the Y position of the WindowRect property.

member.summary: Gets or sets the selection brush to use for the series.

member.remarks: This property is effectively a shortcut to the Top of the ActualWindowRect property.

member.summary: Release any resources held by the control.

member.name: M:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbSeriesViewer.FlushAsync
member.summary: Use to force the SeriesViewer to finish any deferred work before printing or evaluating its visual.
member.remarks: This should only be called if the visual of the SeriesViewer needs to be synchronously saved or evaluated. Calling this method too often will hinder the performance of the SeriesViewer.

member.name: T:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbToolAction
member.summary: Represents base class for all tool actions in toolbar

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbToolAction.Actions
member.summary: Gets the sub actions associated with this tool action.

member.summary: Gets or sets the width to use for this tool action.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbToolAction.BeforeId
member.summary: Gets or sets the Id of the action that this action will be inserted before.
member.remarks: Subsequent actions will continue to insert before the target action, following the original action that set this property. If using this property do not use the AfterId property. This property is only relevant during initial insertion into the toolbar. Changing the property after the action has already been added will have no effect.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbToolAction.AfterId
member.summary: Gets or sets the Id of the action that this action will be inserted after.
member.remarks: Subsequent actions will continue to insert after the target action, following the original action that set this property. If using this property do not use the BeforeId property. This property is only relevant during initial insertion into the toolbar. Changing the property after the action has already been added will have no effect.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbToolAction.OverlayId
member.summary: Sets to the Id of the action that this action will overlay itself on to.
member.remarks: The purpose of this property is to allow users to override actions automatically generated by toolbar targets such as the DataChart. These generated actions all have unique Ids associated with them that can be used for the OverlayId. These overlaid actions will not replace the generated one but will have its properties overlaid onto the generated actions.

member.name: T:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbAnnotationLayer
member.summary: Represents the base class for annotation layer types. Annotations will usually disable some of the default hover/touch behaviors of the chart when they are introduced to the series collection. In return they provide some valuable information as the cursor is moved by hovering over the chart, or performing a press-hold-drag interaction in touch mode.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbAnnotationLayer.UseIndex
member.summary: Gets or sets whether this series should take up an index for auto brush coloring.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbAnnotationLayer.UseLegend
member.summary: Gets or sets whether this series interacts with the chart legend.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbAnnotationLayer.CursorPosition
member.summary: Gets or sets the world position to use instead of the pointer position for this annotation layer. If you set this value, rather than responding to the pointer, this layer will be fixed on the provided world position. A world position has x and y values that range from 0 to 1 that represent the global position of the cursor relative to the entire ranges of the axes. The default of (NaN, NaN) means that the layer should react to pointer movement.

member.summary: Gets or sets the axis display type. Continuous display type divides the axis into even intervals, where labels will not necessarily be aligned with data points. Discrete display type will not use a constant interval, but will align each label with its data point.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbCategoryDateTimeXAxis.Interval
member.summary: Gets or sets the X axis time interval.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbCategoryDateTimeXAxis.ActualInterval
member.summary: Gets the effective value for the current Interval.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbCategoryDateTimeXAxis.MinorInterval
member.summary: Gets or sets the frequency of displayed minor lines.
member.remarks: The set value is a factor that determines how the minor lines will be displayed.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbCategoryDateTimeXAxis.ActualMinorInterval
member.summary: Gets the effective value for the current MinorInterval.

member.name: T:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbCategoryHighlightLayer
member.summary: Represents an annotation layer that targets a category axis, or all category axes in the chart. If the axis contains any series that are aligned between major gridlines of the axis (column, waterfall, etc) this will render a shape that fills the current category. Otherwise it will render a band with an adjustable thickness at the closest gridline to the pointer position. Setting UseIterpolation to true will cause the x position in the latter case to become affixed to the x position of the pointer.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbCategoryHighlightLayer.TargetAxis
member.summary: Gets or sets the axis to target this annotation to. If null, this annotation targets all category axes simultaneously.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbCategoryHighlightLayer.TargetAxisScript
member.summary: Provides a means of setting TargetAxis in the JavaScript environment.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbCategoryHighlightLayer.UseInterpolation
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to use value interpolation when drawing a line through the best value for the pointer position.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbCategoryHighlightLayer.BandHighlightWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the width to use for the highlight region if drawing a band rather than filling a category.

member.name: T:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbCategoryItemHighlightLayer
member.summary: Represents an annotation layer that highlights items in a series that use a category axis either by drawing a banded shape at their position, or by rendering a marker at their position. Depending on the type of series, the default highlight will be affected. To override the type of highlight used, you can set the HighlightType property.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbCategoryItemHighlightLayer.TargetSeries
member.summary: Gets or sets the series to target this annotation to. If null, this annotation targets all series simultaneously.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbCategoryItemHighlightLayer.TargetSeriesScript
member.summary: Provides a means of setting TargetSeries in the JavaScript environment.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbCategoryItemHighlightLayer.TargetSeriesName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the series to target this annotation to. If null, this annotation targets all series simultaneously.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbCategoryItemHighlightLayer.UseInterpolation
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to use value interpolation when drawing a line through the best value for the pointer position.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbCategoryItemHighlightLayer.HighlightType
member.summary: Gets or sets which type of highlight shape to use when highlighting items.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbCategoryItemHighlightLayer.MarkerType
member.summary: Gets or sets which type of marker to use when highlighting items, if appropriate.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbCategoryItemHighlightLayer.MarkerBrush
member.summary: Gets or sets which color to use for the marker when highlighting items, if appropriate.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbCategoryItemHighlightLayer.MarkerOutline
member.summary: Gets or sets which outline color to use for the marker when highlighting items, if appropriate.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbCategoryItemHighlightLayer.MarkerTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets the template to use for marker visuals for the current series object.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbCategoryItemHighlightLayer.MarkerTemplateScript
member.summary: Provides a means of setting MarkerTemplate in the JavaScript environment.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbCategoryItemHighlightLayer.BandHighlightWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the width to use for the highlight region if highlighting items in a grid aligned series (line, spline, etc), with a banded shape.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbCategoryItemHighlightLayer.SkipUnknownValues
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to skip unknown values when searching for series values.

member.summary: Sets or Gets whether to increase marker fidelity for extreme data shapes that have lots of Y variation over short X intervals.

member.summary: Gets or sets whether the series should transition into the plot area when a new data source is assigned. Note: Transitions are not currently supported for stacked series.

member.param: The world position for which to return the index.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbCheckboxList.Keys
member.summary: Gets the collection responsible for selection in the CheckboxList. Selection is determined by two factors: whether everything is selected or deselected and the values present in this collection. If everything is selected then any items in this collection will be deselected. If everything is deselected then any items in this collection will be selected. The CheckboxList defaults all items as deselected. This state can change when you use the SelectAll and DeselectAll methods.

member.name: T:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbCircularGradient
member.summary: Used for defining gradient stops in the igc-circular-progress. For each `igc-circular-gradient` defined as `gradient` slot of `igc-circular-progress` element would be created a SVG stop element. The values passed as `color`, `offset` and `opacity` would be set as `stop-color`, `offset` and `stop-opacity` of the SVG element without further validations.

member.name: T:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbCombo`1
member.summary: The Combo component is similar to the Select component in that it provides a list of options from which the user can make a selection. In contrast to the Select component, the Combo component displays all options in a virtualized list of items, meaning the combo box can simultaneously show thousands of options, where one or more options can be selected. Additionally, users can create custom item templates, allowing for robust data visualization. The Combo component features case-sensitive filtering, grouping, complex data binding, dynamic addition of values and more.

member.summary: The desired unpinned location of the content pane. If not set the Dock Manager automatically calculates it based on the location of the pane relatively to the document host. If more than one document host is presented, the closest one in the pane hierarchy will be used for the calculation. If there is no document host, the default location is left.

member.name: T:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbDataLegend
member.summary: Represents data legend that displays information about each series including values and summaries.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbDataLegend.ActualBadgesVisible
member.summary: Gets whether or not at least one badge is visible based on BadgesShape and setting of a row's IsVisble in StyleSeriesRow event

member.summary: Gets the actual pixel scaling ratio used to affect the pixel density of the control.
member.remarks: A higher scaling ratio will produce crisper visuals at the expense of memory. Lower values will cause the control to appear blurry.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbDataLegend.IncludedSeries
member.summary: Gets or sets indexes, titles, or names of series to include in displaying in the data legend, e.g. "0, 1" or "Series1 Title, Series2 Title"
member.remarks: The ExcludedSeries property takes precedence over values of IncludedSeries property

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbDataLegend.ExcludedSeries
member.summary: Gets or sets indexes, titles, or names of series to exclude from displaying in the data legend, e.g. "0, 1" or "Series1 Title, Series2 Title"
member.remarks: The ExcludedSeries property takes precedence over values of IncludedSeries property

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbDataLegend.IncludedColumns
member.summary: Gets or sets names of data columns or their labels to include in displaying in the data legend, e.g. "High, Low" or "H, L"
member.remarks: The ExcludedColumns property takes precedence over values of IncludedColumns property

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbDataLegend.ExcludedColumns
member.summary: Gets or sets names of data columns or their labels to exclude from displaying in the data legend, e.g. "High, Low" or "H, L"
member.remarks: The ExcludedColumns property takes precedence over values of IncludedColumns property

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbDataLegend.ShouldUpdateWhenSeriesDataChanges
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the data legend should update when the series data is mutated.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbDataLegend.ValueFormatAbbreviation
member.summary: Gets or sets mode for abbreviating large numbers displayed in the legend
member.remarks: This property is ignored when setting ValueFormatSpecifiers or ValueFormatString properties

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbDataLegend.ValueFormatMaxFractions
member.summary: Gets or sets maximum digits for formatting numbers displayed in the legend
member.remarks: This property is ignored when setting ValueFormatSpecifiers or ValueFormatString properties

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbDataLegend.ValueFormatMinFractions
member.summary: Gets or sets minimum digits for formatting numbers displayed in the legend
member.remarks: This property is ignored when setting ValueFormatSpecifiers or ValueFormatString properties

member.summary: Gets or sets the mode for displaying values in the data legend, e.g. Currency ($500.25), Decimal (500.25), Integer (500)

member.summary: Gets or sets globalization culture when displaying values as currencies, e.g. use "en-GB" to display British pound symbol when the ValueFormatMode property is set to 'Currency' mode
member.remarks: This property is ignored when setting ValueFormatSpecifiers or ValueFormatString properties

member.summary: Gets or sets whether the Y-axis should use a logarithmic scale instead of a linear one.
member.remarks: Since log(-1) is imaginary and log(0) is undefined, it is recommended to enable this property only when the Y-axis minimum is greater than zero.

member.summary: Gets or sets indexes, titles, or names of series to include in displaying in the data legend, e.g. "0, 1" or "Series1 Title, Series2 Title"
member.remarks: The ExcludedSeries property takes precedence over values of IncludedSeries property

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbDataToolTipLayer.ExcludedSeries
member.summary: Gets or sets indexes, titles, or names of series to exclude from displaying in the data legend, e.g. "0, 1" or "Series1 Title, Series2 Title"
member.remarks: The ExcludedSeries property takes precedence over values of IncludedSeries property

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbDataToolTipLayer.IncludedColumns
member.summary: Gets or sets names of data columns or their labels to include in displaying in the data tooltip, e.g. "High, Low" or "H, L"
member.remarks: The ExcludedColumns property takes precedence over values of IncludedColumns property

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbDataToolTipLayer.ExcludedColumns
member.summary: Gets or sets names of data columns or their labels to exclude from displaying in the data tooltip, e.g. "High, Low" or "H, L"
member.remarks: The ExcludedColumns property takes precedence over values of IncludedColumns property

member.remarks: This property is ignored when setting ValueFormatSpecifiers or ValueFormatString properties

member.remarks: This property is ignored when setting ValueFormatSpecifiers or ValueFormatString properties

member.summary: Utility class for color-based operations.

member.name: M:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.Util.ColorUtil.RandomColor(System.Byte)
member.summary: Returns a random color.
member.param: The alpha level of the color to generate.
member.returns: A random color with the specified alpha level.

member.name: M:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.Util.ColorUtil.RandomHue(IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.Color)
member.summary: Get a random color
member.param: Specifies the alpha, saturation and value for the returned color

member.name: M:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.Util.ColorUtil.GetInterpolation(IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.Color,System.Double,IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.Color,IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.Util.InterpolationMode)
member.summary: Get an interpolation from the current color to the specified color
member.param: begin color, corresponding to p=0.0
interpolation parameter assumed to be in [0.0, 1.0]
end color, corresponding to p=1.0
Interpolation mode to use.
member.returns: new color corresponding to the specified interpolation parameter
member.remarks: There are always two interpolation paths for the hue, and this function chooses the shortest one, so for example an interpolation from red to blue runs through purple, not orange, yellow and green.

member.name: M:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.Util.ColorUtil.GetAHSVInterpolation(System.Double[],System.Double,System.Double[])
member.summary: Get an interpolated color between two colors.
member.param: begin color, corresponding to p=0.0
interpolation parameter assumed to be in [0.0, 1.0]
end color, corresponding to p=1.0
member.returns: new color corresponding to the specified interpolation parameter
member.remarks: There are always two interpolation paths for the hue, and this function chooses the shortest one, so for example an interpolation from red to blue runs through purple, not orange, yellow and green.

member.summary: Gets the ahsl components of this color

member.summary: Gets the ahsv components of this color

member.name: M:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.Util.ColorUtil.FromAHSL(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Gets a color from the specified ahsl components
member.param: The alpha (transparency), expressed as a value between 0 and 1, where 0 is transparent and 1 is opaque.
The hue (color), expressed as a value between 0 and 1, where 0 is red, 1 is also red, and in between are orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo, and violet.
The saturation (colorfulness), expressed as a value between 0 and 1, where 0 is gray and 1 is fully saturated/colorful.
The lightness, expressed as a value between 0 and 1, where 0 is black and 1 is white.

member.name: M:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.Util.ColorUtil.FromAHSV(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)

member.name: T:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbFinancialCalculationDataSource
member.summary: Represents the data contract between a financial series and the decoupled calculation responsibilities which implement its mathmatical logic.
member.remarks: The FinancialCalculationDataSource contract represents the subset of data which needs to be provided in order to test or run a calculation, and its intentionally a subset of the information available to the series, in order to make calculation strategies more easily testable and usable in isolation to the financial series container.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbFinancialCalculationDataSource.TypicalColumn
member.summary: An enumerable list of typical prices provided by the series to use in calculations.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbFinancialCalculationDataSource.TrueRange
member.summary: And enumerable list of true range values provided by the series to use in calculations.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbFinancialCalculationDataSource.TrueLow
member.summary: An enumerable list of true low values provided by the series to use in calculations.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbFinancialCalculationDataSource.Period
member.summary: The period to use when calculating, if applicable.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbFinancialCalculationDataSource.ShortPeriod
member.summary: The short period to use when calculating, if applicable.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbFinancialCalculationDataSource.LongPeriod
member.summary: The long period to use when calculating, if applicable.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbFinancialCalculationDataSource.Count
member.summary: The count of the values in the series.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbFinancialCalculationDataSource.CalculateFrom
member.summary: The starting index from which to calculate

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbFinancialCalculationDataSource.CalculateCount
member.summary: The number of items from the starting index from which to calculate

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbFinancialCalculationDataSource.Multiplier
member.summary: If the calculation supports some sort of scaling factor, this value will be used.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbFinancialCalculationDataSource.MinimumValue
member.summary: If the calculation determines the range of indicator values, it will set the minimum and maximux properties.
member.remarks: This will contain the previous minimum value when the indicator calculation is called again, in case this makes the update of the value speedier.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbFinancialCalculationDataSource.MaximumValue
member.summary: If the calculation determines the range of indicator values, it will set the minimum and maximux properties.
member.remarks: This will contain the previous minimum value when the indicator calculation is called again, in case this makes the update of the value speedier.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbFinancialCalculationDataSource.SpecifiesRange
member.summary: The calculation strategy should set this to true if it specifes the minimum and maximum value properties.

member.summary: Represents a contract between the financial series and the calculation strategies detailing the supporting calculation strategies that the financial series will provide in order for the indicator calculations to be performed.

member.summary: The strategy provided to calculate an exponential moving average for a collection.

member.summary: The strategy provided to calculate a simple moving average for a collection.

member.summary: The strategy provided to calculate a standard deviation for a collection.

member.summary: The strategy provided to calculate a moving sum for a collection.

member.summary: The strategy provided to calculate the short period moving average for volume oscillator indicators.

member.summary: The strategy provided to calculate the long period moving average for volume oscillator indicators.

member.summary: The strategy provided to calculate the short period moving average for price oscillator indicators.

member.summary: The strategy provided to calculate the long period moving average for price oscillator indicators.

member.summary: Base class for hosting chart series in a IgbGeographicMap.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbGeographicMapSeriesHost.VisibleFromScale
member.summary: The minimum scale at which this series becomes visible.
member.remarks: The default value for this property is 1.0, which means the series will always be visible. At a VisibleFromScale setting of 0.0, the series will never be visible. At a VisibleFromScale setting of 0.5, the series will be visible as long as the map is zoomed in to at least 200%.

member.name: T:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbGeographicShapeSeriesBase
member.summary: Base class for series which render polygons on a map.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbGeographicShapeSeriesBase.ShapeMemberPath
member.summary: The name of the property on ItemsSource items which, for each shape, contains a list of points to be converted to a polygon.
member.remarks: To be consistent with the Shapefile technical description, it is expected that each list of points is defined as an IEnumerable of IEnumerable of Point, or in other words, a list of lists of points.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbGeographicShapeSeriesBase.IsCustomShapeStyleAllowed
member.summary: Gets or sets whether this Shape series should allow custom style overrides of its individual visuals.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbGeographicShapeSeriesBase.IsCustomShapeMarkerStyleAllowed
member.summary: Gets or sets whether this Shape series should allow custom style overrides of its individual marker visuals.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbGeographicShapeSeriesBase.ItemSearchMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the mode the series will use to find the closest point to the cursor.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbGeographicShapeSeriesBase.ItemSearchThreshold
member.summary: Gets or sets the threshold to use when searching for items using ItemSearchMode.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbGeographicShapeSeriesBase.ItemSearchPointsThreshold
member.summary: Gets or sets the points threshold to use when searching for items using ItemSearchMode.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbGeographicShapeSeriesBase.ShapefileDataSource
member.summary: Set a shapefile datasource to use with the series.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbGeographicShapeSeriesBase.ShapeFilterResolution
member.summary: The resolution at which to filter out shapes in the series. For example, if the ShapeFilterResolution is set to 3, then elements with a bounding rectangle smaller than 3 X 3 pixels will be filtered out.
member.remarks: In the case of GeographicPolylineSeries, the resolution is compared to either dimension, rather than both. In other words, a polyline will not be filtered if its height or its width exceeds the value of this property. Whereas with a ShapeSeries, both the height and the width must exceed the value of this property.

member.name: T:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbGeographicXYTriangulatingSeries
member.summary: Base class for geographic series which triangulate XY data prior to rendering.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbGeographicXYTriangulatingSeries.LongitudeMemberPath
member.summary: The name of the property from which to extract the Longitude for each item in the ItemsSource.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbGeographicXYTriangulatingSeries.LatitudeMemberPath
member.summary: The name of the property from which to extract the Latitude for each item in the ItemsSource.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbGeographicXYTriangulatingSeries.TrianglesSource
member.summary: The source of triangulation data.
member.remarks: This property is optional. If it is left as null, the triangulation will be created based on the items in the ItemsSource. Triangulation is a demanding operation, so the runtime performance will be better when specifying a TriangulationSource, especially when a large number of data items are present.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbGeographicXYTriangulatingSeries.TrianglesSourceScript
member.summary: Provides a means of setting TrianglesSource in the JavaScript environment.

member.summary: The name of the property of the TrianglesSource items which, for each triangle, contains the index of the first vertex point in the ItemsSource.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbGeographicXYTriangulatingSeries.TriangleVertexMemberPath2
member.summary: The name of the property of the TrianglesSource items which, for each triangle, contains the index of the second vertex point in the ItemsSource.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbGeographicXYTriangulatingSeries.TriangleVertexMemberPath3
member.summary: The name of the property of the TrianglesSource items which, for each triangle, contains the index of the third vertex point in the ItemsSource.

member.name: M:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.DataSource.FlushAutoRefreshAsync
member.summary: Called to make sure a queued refresh of the data source has been applied before continuing. Should only be needed if you are trying to synchronously examine the results of changing settings on the data source. Note, for a virtual data source, the data source itself may be waiting for other synchronous requests to actualize data. This call will not wait for those, but will only make sure the appropriate requests are in flight from the settings changes

member.summary: A horizontal axis that uses an ordinal DateTime scale.

member.summary: Gets or sets the DateTime mapping property for the axis.

member.summary: Gets or sets the labelling mode to use when the automatic label formats are applied.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbOrdinalTimeXAxis.LabelFormats
member.summary: A list of axis label formats to apply, which are selected according to the visible axis range.
member.remarks: The label format selected will be the one with the largest range smaller than the visible range of the axis.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbOrdinalTimeXAxis.MinimumValue
member.summary: Sets the minimum DateTime value to be displayed on this axis.
member.remarks: This property can be used to constrain the items displayed on the axis, within the range of DateTimes in the ItemsSource. It will ignore any setting outside the actual range of data.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbOrdinalTimeXAxis.MaximumValue
member.summary: Sets the maximum DateTime value to be displayed on this axis.
member.remarks: This property can be used to constrain the items displayed on the axis, within the range of DateTimes in the ItemsSource. It will ignore any setting outside the actual range of data.

member.name: T:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbPinColumnCancellableEventArgs
member.summary: The event arguments before a column's pin state is changed. `insertAtIndex`specifies at which index in the pinned/unpinned area the column is inserted. Can be changed in the `columnPin` event. `isPinned` returns the actual pin state of the column. When pinning/unpinning is successful, the value of `isPinned` will change accordingly when read in the "-ing" and "-ed" event.

member.name: T:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbPinColumnCancellableEventArgsDetail
member.summary: The event arguments before a column's pin state is changed. `insertAtIndex`specifies at which index in the pinned/unpinned area the column is inserted. Can be changed in the `columnPin` event. `isPinned` returns the actual pin state of the column. When pinning/unpinning is successful, the value of `isPinned` will change accordingly when read in the "-ing" and "-ed" event.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbPinColumnCancellableEventArgsDetail.InsertAtIndex
member.summary: If pinned, specifies at which index in the pinned area the column is inserted. If unpinned, specifies at which index in the unpinned area the column is inserted.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbPinColumnCancellableEventArgsDetail.IsPinned
member.summary: Returns the actual pin state of the column. If pinning/unpinning is successful, value of `isPinned` will change accordingly when read in the "-ing" and "-ed" event.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbPinColumnCancellableEventArgsDetail.Cancel
member.summary: Provides the ability to cancel the event.

member.summary: The event arguments after a column's pin state is changed. `insertAtIndex`specifies at which index in the pinned/unpinned area the column was inserted. `isPinned` returns the actual pin state of the column after the operation completed.

member.name: T:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbPinColumnEventArgsDetail
member.summary: The event arguments after a column's pin state is changed. `insertAtIndex`specifies at which index in the pinned/unpinned area the column was inserted. `isPinned` returns the actual pin state of the column after the operation completed.

member.summary: Returns the actual pin state of the column. If pinning/unpinning is successful, value of `isPinned` will change accordingly when read in the "-ing" and "-ed" event.

member.name: P:IgniteUI.Blazor.Controls.IgbShapeSeriesBase.ShapeFilterResolution
member.summary: The resolution at which to filter out shapes in the series. For example, if the ShapeFilterResolution is set to 3, then elements with a bounding rectangle smaller than 3 X 3 pixels will be filtered out.
member.remarks: In the case of ScatterPolylineSeries, the resolution is compared to either dimension, rather than both. In other words, a polyline will not be filtered if its height or its width exceeds the value of this property. Whereas with a ShapeSeries, both the height and the width must exceed the value of this property.

member.summary: A slider component used to select numeric value within a range.
